about_the_game:
Leave those customer mouths watering for more with the Savory Bundle!

This Bundle contains:

600 Spoons to help you upgrade your kitchen equipment;

2 +3 Customers boosts, so you have people to serve when it counts;

2 +30 Seconds boosts, so you can add time to the clock when you need it;

1 Second Chance boost to give you a do-over if you make a mistake;

1 Insta-Cook boost to make your meals in a flash;

1 Burn-Proofer boost that keeps your food looking fresh if you leave it cooking for too long;

1 Price Doubler boosts that helps you earn more coins;

1 Dazzler boost that can stop everything when the going gets rough;

1 Waiter boost that helps serve your dishes automatically to keep your hands free to cook.

The Savory Bundle checks all the right boxes that set you up for success!
